content: 15 k4 slm *m1l c2f p2 c2f repeat to m m1r** slm k8 slm repeat from * to ** slm k4 56 sts row 16 k4 slm *k1 p2 k2 repeat to 3 sts before m p2 k1 ** slm k8 slm repeat from * to ** slm k4 row 17 as row 5 60 sts row 18 as row 6 row 19 as row 15 64 sts row 20 as row 16 row 21 k4 slm *m1l p1 c2f p2 c2f repeat to 1 st before m p1 m1r ** slm k8 slm repeat from * to ** slm k4 68 sts row 22 k4 slm *k2 p2 k2 repeat to m ** slm k8 slm repeat from * to ** slm k4 row 23 as row 5 72 sts row 24 as row 6 these 24 row form the lichen pattern repeat each repeat increasing 48 sts work this repeat 2 times in total and then row 1 12 again 60 row total taking the increased sts into the pattern in the same way 144 sts begin reversed stocking st and moss st panel as follows from* to *** maintaining the garter edges centre band and directional increases throughout or moss st panel chart row 1 & 2 *work 2 row reversed stocking st rs purl ws knit 148 sts row 3 5 7 9 & 11 *k1 p1 repeat from * across row 4 6 8 10 & 12 *p1 k1 repeat from * across 168 sts row 13 &14 work 2 row reversed stocking st ** 172 sts lichen & moss shawl page 3 work 2 row in stocking st *** 176 sts nb these last 2 row are only worked between the reversed stocking st & moss st panel and the lichen pattern not before border resume lichen pattern maintaining the garter edges centre band and directional increases throughout work the 24 row repeat once and then row 1- 12 again 36 row total taking the increased sts into the pattern as before 248 sts work the 14 row reversed stocking st and moss st panel from *to ** maintaining the garter edges centre band and directional increases throughout 276 sts border note no increases are made in these row and the stitch markers can be removed as they are reached row 1 - 4 knit bobble on rs as follows p 2 *put sts back on left needle p2tog repeat from * to end break yarn & fasten_off weave in ends block see note at end of large shawl and enjoy large shawl follow directions for the medium shawl until after the first repeat of the reversed stocking st and moss st panel including the 2 stocking st row to *** 176 sts then continue as follows work 24 row of the lichen pattern twice and then row 1 12 again 60 row the 14 row of reversed stocking st & moss stitch panel followed by 2 stocking st row 328 sts work row
